title: Sharkron Balloon
summaries: The Sharkron Balloon is an accessory that combines the effects of the Tsunami in a Bottle and the Balloon Pufferfish. It boosts jump height by 33% and jump speed by 30% increasing your first jump's height to ~10½ blocks (~75% increase), and provides a double jump that now goes 13 blocks, for a total height of 23½ blocks.
Jump height is oddly reduced when underwater, reducing your total underwater height from 17½ blocks (8 blocks + 9½ blocks from Tsunami jump) to 15 blocks (7 blocks + 8 blocks from Tsunami jump).
It can be combined with a <linked>Lucky Horseshoe</linked> at a <linked>Tinkerer's Workshop</linked> to make a <linked>Pink Horseshoe Balloon</linked>.

statistics.Tooltip:
Increases jump height
Allows the holder to double jump
statistics.Sell: 3 GC
